Method Detail

destroy

public void destroy()
Description copied from interface: IAeXMLDBDataSource
Destroys the data source, cleaning up any resouces associated with it. This is really only useful for testing purposes where the data source is destroyed between each test run and is only implemented for a pooled data source.

Specified by:
destroy in interface IAeXMLDBDataSource
See Also:
IAeXMLDBDataSource.destroy()
